TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BackEventHandler(object sender, BackEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed BackEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.Back> event of a <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer>.
Docs.remarks:
## Remarks A <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.Back> event occurs when the user has navigated to a drillthrough report and clicks the **Back** button to return to the parent report. The <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.BackEventArgs> object contains the parent report.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
